com.samsung.multiscreen

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.multiscreen.Channel
      • com.samsung.multiscreen.Application

  • public class Application
extends Channel
    The Application class allows management of installed and web applications on MultiScreen-enabled devices. It provides the facilities to connect, launch and commmunicate with the remote applications.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Returns if the channel is connected and the host is ready to listen for messages.
        Overrides:
        isConnected in class Channel
        Returns:
        true, if connected and the host is ready. false, otherwise.

      • getInfo

        Retrieve information for the specified application.
        Parameters:
        result - the asynchronous callback to invoke with the retrieved ApplicationInfo

      • start

        public void start(Result<Boolean> result)
        Start or launch the specified application.
        Parameters:
        result - the asynchronous callback to invoke with the result of starting the application

      • stop

        public void stop(Result<Boolean> result)
        Stop the specified application.
        Parameters:
        result - the asynchronous callback to invoke with the result of stopping the application

      • install

        public void install(Result<Boolean> result)
        Install the specified application. Note that this will fail if the specified application does not exist or a web application is specified.
        Parameters:
        result - the asynchronous callback to invoke with the result of installing the application

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect(boolean stopOnDisconnect,
                       Result<Client> result)
        Disconnect from the specified channel.
        Parameters:
        stopOnDisconnect - stop the TV application, if true. Otherwise, disconnect and leave the TV application running.
        result - the callback to invoke with the result of the disconnect request

      • setOnConnectListener

        public void setOnConnectListener(Channel.OnConnectListener onConnectListener)
        Description copied from class: Channel
        Set the listener for connect events. Setting the parameter to null will remove the listener.
        Overrides:
        setOnConnectListener in class Channel

      • isWebapp

        public boolean isWebapp()
        Returns whether the specified application is a web application.
        Returns:
        true, if the application is a web application. false, otherwise.
